description: great game for childrens
AI is unbeatable because mouse control are not yet there.

We had Ubuntu MATE installed in my previous school's computers. The games our teacher provided us with were SuperTux and Tuxpuck. Tuxpuck was the hottest game and every student would sit around a kid's computer because he was so good at playing it. So many memoriees with this game...

This game isn't playable in practice because there is nothing you can do. A shame, because it's fun to control with the gyro of the Steam Deck. The AI never makes a mistake and moves their mallet to where the puck will be way faster than the maximum travel speed of the puck, making it literally impossible to win. At the same time, the AI doesn't attempt to outplay you, it just perfectly defends its side by moving the mallet to the middle of the trajectory of the puck. That means you can't even make it a game of how-long-can-I-last, because the answer is forever. You just place your mallet such that the puck is shot in a straight line and the AI will never move an inch to try and score. This will go on ad infinitum.

Despite this, I'm giving it a cautionary average three stars. It feels like it was never playtested, and that's hard to believe. I think what's really going on is that this game depends on CPU frequencies and was created for far weaker machines, where the AI would react much slower. In other words, I think the AI is just a simple program that moves the mallet to where it needs to be at a set speed, so the player has a chance to score by aiming away from the enemy mallet's current position. But when the CPU is too fast, the AI also moves too fast, and just like that the game is broken.

Again, pure speculation on my part, but I assume that's the most likely explanation.
The AI is way too good. It's pretty much impossible to win or score. Mouse sensitivity is way too high and the window is too small.
Solo hay 2 personajes y es muy dificil ganar, no se le puede cambiar la dificultada y uno de los personajes es muy Tramposo y no es Divertido, La verdad, no se lo Recomiendo a Nadie

summary: Je sais pas ce que c'est !

description:
pipi!! 
proute 
sexe

Je met le max d'étoiles,mais ça gagnerait bien sûr à être peaufiné..Pour ceux qui ont l'air de pas connaitre du tout,çà reproduit un jeu dans les foires,une table comme sur coussin d'air où l'on se renvoie un galet qui glisse come sur de la glace...J'ai connu sa version vidéo sur un macintosh dans les années 80,et jamais pu retrouver ça ailleurs..La base est là,l'ajout d'autres adversaires et réglages de vitesse serait bienvenu.Mais c'est déjà une petite joie de retomber sur ce binz qui,bien entendu,se joue avec la souris,pour guider son "galet" de tir!Voili voiloù...
summary: Enfin je retrouve un équivalent de shufflepuck!!
